title: Varieties of Parable
content:
I’m especially interested in the italic.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [06macneice.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124913/http:/typophile.com/files/06macneice.jpg) | 33.13 KB |
author: Sirre

comments.content: This looks like Calligraphy. I’m not very knowledgeable about digital versions of this style, there may be some out there, but it looks pretty unique.
I thought the a’s and e’s matched up so I figured it a face, but now that I look at it closer I see it’s probably done by hand.

Could be Michael Harvey. Looks like early work. What is the pub. date on the book?

Michael
